item.title: python mysql 2014 error
item.author: chennqqi@qq.com (chennqqi)
item.description: ###python mysqlDB批量插入数据时报错 python MySQLdb module error code: Error 2014: Commands out of sync; you can't run this command now This happened when excute mysql batch operation. Solution: Every mysql option done, then call commit() Using executemany funcion is recommand. list = [] sql = 'INSERT INTO tablexxx(a,b,c) VALUES(%s,%s,%s)' for l in ll: list.append(l) db.executemany(sql, list)#db.fetchmany() ... db.commit()
